title: Zarif Azher – I want to use powerful technology to improve healthcare access and quality worldwide.
meta_description: I want to use powerful technology to improve healthcare access and quality worldwide.
main_content: Hi, I’m Zarif. I want to use powerful technology to improve healthcare access and quality worldwide. I’m always open to new ideas, opportunities, and partners. To contact me, please email: zarif.azher@gmail.com! Leader Organizing people and things to accomplish ambitious goals. Researcher Developing novel solutions to real-world issues – science for action, not observation. Innovator Bringing impactful products to the places which need them the most. Collaborators Working with diverse opinions and experts to formulate solutions. Here’s a few fast facts about me: Undergraduate student @ California Institute of Technology (Class of 2028). 10+ peer-reviewed publications in major scientific journals and international conferences, focused on developing interpretable AI for cancer diagnostics and treatment. Spearheaded projects to fight government corruption in Bangladesh, advocate for environmental justice in the USA, and deploy novel assistive-technology for medical practitioners in underserved regions. Strong background in ML/AI development, validation, and deployment, with experience working both in large institutions and fast-moving startups. Full resume/CV: email (zazher@caltech.edu). List of experiences: LinkedIn ( https://www.linkedin.com/in/zarif-azher-260b401bb/ ). Complete publication list: Google Scholar ( https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=RuRyHyYAAAAJ&hl=en ).
